recipe.title: Blackberry Herb Cocktail
ingredients: 1 (750-ml) bottle Prosecco (Italian sparkling white wine), chilled
Garnishes: fresh rosemary sprigs and blackberries
instructions: Simmer blackberries, sugar, water, and rosemary in a small heavy saucepan, uncovered, stirring occasionally, until thickened and reduced by about two thirds, about 20 minutes. Pour into a very fine sieve set over a glass measure and let stand 5 minutes (there will be about 1/3 cup). Discard solids (do not press on them). Chill syrup, covered, until cold. Divide Prosecco among 6 small flutes, then pour 1 1/2 teaspoons syrup into each drink.
